resources.string: How much money do you intend to spend within a month from now?
"How much money do you intend to spend within a month from now?"
"How much help do you intend to give for charity at home, work, friends, relatives, neighbours, or someone you don\'t know?"
"How many kind words do you intend to offer as a charity, whether in your real life or social networking sites?"
"How often do you intend to pray for the good of others?"
"How often do you intend to smile with the intention of charity?"
"How often do you intend to talk about this app, whether in your real life or social networking sites, in the belief that The one who directs to goodness is like the one who does it?"
